title: [Gameplay] HN Jhin Q bounce only twice
body: when i use jhin's skin, i notice that sometimes after i Q, if i move in a certain direction or cancel an AA that his bouncing bullet might only bounce once or twice. idk if this has been brought up before, but its definitely an issue that needs to be fixed please!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a known issue and we're working on a fix! ^-^ Thanks for the report!
sometimes occurs for me when the entity it was bouncing to was killed just as it landed
